mapper.insert: insert into attendance_status( attendance_status_no, attendance_status_member_id, attendance_status_current, attendance_status_max, attendance_status_total ) values ( seq_attendance_status.nextval, #{attendanceStatusMemberId}, 1, 1, 1 )
mapper.update: update attendance_status set attendance_status_current = #{attendanceStatusCurrent}, attendance_status_max = #{attendanceStatusMax}, attendance_status_total = attendance_status_total + 1, attendance_status_lastdate = systimestamp where attendance_status_member_id = #{attendanceStatusMemberId}
